text:
Message 982 of 4024
That’s great news!
I think you will agree, this appears to be a post Dr Brown conversation like the rest of our life.
Sent:02/02/2024 at 06:19 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/02/2024 at 06:34 PM)
Subject:Re: Spring Break/Cabo
Message 983 of 4024
There is no debate. I can show you. I have offered tens of times. I can actually show you with your own eyes. In real life. You have questions, let’s
answer them. We don’t need to fight at all.
What is Dr Brown sorting out? We definitely agreed we would work together on what we wanted and how we would go about it. Is that still the plan
or has this moved to unilateral decisions and direction?
On both counts, I am sincerely trying to coordinate and cooperate with you. But I honestly don’t think you are open to anything I say. Can we work
together on our kids issues or are you sole decision maker?
Hoping its the former
Sent:02/02/2024 at 06:27 PM
From:Robert Moyer

Subject:Re: Gorgeous Day: Dad & AD

Message 985 of 4024
Let’s pause in this. It’s not helpful right now.,
I have asked to move forward and respond to Dr Brown a few times today for times in email and here and I haven’t seen response so I’ll just step away
for now.
I honestly feel sometimes you don’t respond to masks to continue the conversation.
I’m going to step away and regroup tomorrow
